      Handles when a player disconnects from/leaves the game.

      res - response message

    • validateSocketUsername

      public static boolean validateSocketUsername(Message req, Message res)
      Validates the incoming request by checking if the player that sent the message is impersonating another client. Used to prevent "sabotage" through impersonation of other clients: ie: (player1) -> {"method": "quit", "username": "player3"} would lead to the disconnection of player3, but the message was sent by player1.
      Parameters:
      req - request message
      res - response message
      Returns:
      true if the client's username matches the bound socket, false if the client is trying to impersonate another player.

    • handlePlayerNameChange

      public static void handlePlayerNameChange(Message req, Message res)
      Handles the assignment of names to the clients. Necessary in case a user wants to change username while connected to the server.
      Parameters:
      req - request message
      res - response message
